title: Saturday free entry tournament!

embed.description: TinyTourney. 121 likes Â· 15 talking about this. An organisation that host competitive events the online gaming community eg League of Legends.

body: Me and my friend looking for 3 players to play a free tournament. Have some fun and see how far we can get, the top prize is 3200RP. Plat V+ only add me in game -DOKE
